description: TOKI Asia is a Singapore-based software development company specializing in digital transformation solutions and custom software development for businesses across Southeast Asia.
highlights: Developed and deployed e-commerce mobile applications to Play Store and App Store with complete API integration for seamless shopping experience
Built and maintained scalable APIs and microservices architecture
Created responsive user interfaces for the company's main website
Architected and deployed microservices infrastructure using AWS services including RDS, Amplify, EC2, and Load Balancer for improved scalability and performance

description: Hooli Software leverages new and upcoming technologies to help our clients compete in the market.
highlights: Developed and deployed full-stack web and mobile applications using React and React Native
Architected and implemented microservices using Scala and Java, ensuring scalability and maintainability
Integrated Stripe payment gateway for secure payment processing and subscription management
Set up and managed AWS infrastructure using EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service) for container orchestration
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins for automated testing and deployment workflows
Optimized application performance through containerization and infrastructure automation

description: For educational institutions, Pro-Solutions Technology aim's to be the trusted provider of Smart School systems, empowering schools with innovative and efficient solutions.
highlights: Developed and implemented a comprehensive Learning Management System (LMS) using React and React Native for web and mobile platforms
Built and maintained backend infrastructure using Python and Strapi headless CMS for efficient content management
Orchestrated deployment and maintenance of services using Digital Ocean and Docker containerization
Conducted client demonstrations and training sessions to facilitate understanding of the LMS features and capabilities

description: A professional IT services company providing custom software solutions for small to medium-sized businesses, specializing in web and mobile development with a team of skilled freelance developers.
highlights: Developed a facial recognition mobile application using React Native, enhancing security and authentication capabilities
Built and maintained a loan management system using Laravel, implementing features like automated payment tracking and user management
Successfully deployed and managed Laravel applications on Linode Linux servers, including server configuration and SSL setup
Maintained and optimized product content management system using CodeIgniter framework
